# Checklist
- [ ] Human reviewer approval required (no self-merge).
- [ ] No secrets committed; OAuth keys/env handled securely.
- [ ] Data stays in `data/` (gitignored); provenance noted if new sources added.
- [ ] For model changes: noted metric deltas and projection version bumps if applicable.
- [ ] For UI changes: attached screenshots/recordings.
